effect.name: Krita Frect (Background)
effect.description:
(The effect comes from the Krita) The Frect Blending Mode Shader combines the Freeze and Reflect blending modes to produce a smooth and detailed result. When the sum of the layer values exceeds 1, it uses the Freeze blending mode; otherwise, it uses the Reflect blending mode.
Last Updated: 2026-01-04 22:01
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Krita Frect (Background) Shader | 1.2 (18.10.2025) */
parameter.description: (The effect comes from the Krita) The Frect Blending Mode Shader combines the Freeze and Reflect blending modes to produce a smooth and detailed result. When the sum of the layer values exceeds 1, it uses the Freeze blending mode; otherwise, it uses the Reflect blending mode.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.

parameter.name: ( Compatibility )
parameter.description: Here you will find options that have changed, but you can still achieve the previous effect.

parameter.name: Is Fusion Version Older Than 296?
parameter.description: (Only applies to Android and iOS!) This variable determines whether to use the newer background formatting. In Clickteam Fusion 2.5 for build 295.10 and earlier, the background texture was flipped along the Y axis, but this was changed in build 296.1. Check this option if you are using an older build!
